Hero.title: Join the billsder Beta
Hero.subtitle: The Ultimate Solution for Your Business Management - Beta Access
Hero.description: The accounting management software that simplifies your business life, from invoicing to collection, through tracking inputs, outputs, and your inventory. billsder follows you every step of the way.
Hero.beta_seats_description: Only the first 150 participants will be selected to take part in our exclusive beta program. The beta is completely free and gives you early access to all billsder features before the official launch.
Hero.feature_description_1: No more chasing clients. Send your invoices and collect payments directly online.
Hero.feature_description_2: Track your stock in real-time and avoid costly shortages or surpluses.
Hero.feature_description_3: Keep complete history of your relationships and save time in your exchanges.
Hero.feature_description_4: Discover what sells best and make decisions based on real data, not assumptions.

Footer.description: The accounting management software that simplifies your business life, from invoicing to collection, through tracking inputs, outputs, and your inventory. billsder follows you every step of the way.

newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive our latest news and updates.

AboutUs.title: About Us
AboutUs.description: Revolutionizing invoicing for businesses of all sizes
AboutUs.goal: At billsder, we're on a mission to simplify the invoicing process. We understand the challenges businesses face when it comes to billing, and we've created a solution that's intuitive, efficient, and adaptable to your needs.
AboutUs.feature_1_description: Design professional invoices in minutes with our user-friendly interface. No more struggling with complex software or templates.
AboutUs.feature_2_description: Save time with automated recurring invoices, payment reminders, and real-time tracking. Focus on your business while we handle the paperwork.
AboutUs.feature_3_description: Create invoices in multiple currencies and languages. Expand your business globally without the hassle of manual conversions or translations.
AboutUs.company_description: billsder is proudly created by UCODEBYUS, a forward-thinking software development company dedicated to creating innovative solutions that simplify business processes. With a team of experienced developers and a passion for user-centric design, UCODEBYUS is committed to delivering high-quality, intuitive software that makes a real difference in how businesses operate.

About.title: About billsder
About.subtitle: The Ultimate Solution for Your Business Management
About.our_mission_description: To simplify business management for entrepreneurs and companies by providing an all-in-one platform that handles invoicing, payments, inventory, and analytics with ease and efficiency.
About.why_description_1: Manage invoicing, payments, inventory, and analytics from a single platform
About.why_description_2: Intuitive interface designed for businesses of all sizes
About.why_description_3: Support for multiple currencies and languages
About.why_description_4: Get instant insights into your business performance
About.story_1: billsder was born from the need to simplify business management for entrepreneurs who struggle with complex accounting software and fragmented tools.
About.story_2: We believe that running a business should be straightforward, and technology should empower rather than complicate your daily operations.
About.about_ucodebyus_description: billsder is proudly created by UCODEBYUS, a forward-thinking software development company dedicated to creating innovative solutions that simplify business processes.
